note.p: Innkeeper. Proprietor of the Crown Hotel, Nazeing, Essex, 1851, 1861. In Great Amwell, Hertfordshire, 1871.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1770/348/9), 1861 (RG9/1064/146/10), 1871 (RG10/1349/137/63)
